# signedPayload

**Type**

A cryptographically signed payload, in JSON Web Signature (JWS) format, containing the response body for a version 2 notification.

## Declaration

```swift
string signedPayload
```

## Discussion

The `signedpayload` is a string of three Base64 URL-encoded components, separated by a period.

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppStoreServerNotifications/signedPayload] in [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppStoreServerNotifications].

## Data types

- **sendAttemptItem**: The success or error information and the date the App Store server records when it attempts to send a server notification to your server.

items.description: The success or error information and the date the App Store server records when it attempts to send a server notification to your server.
